name: Lazyweb: I bought my wife an iPad Pro 10.5". She wants a case with full coverage, but she doesn't necessarily want a keyboard at all times. Any recommendations? I think a lightweight full-wrap case plus a small bluetooth keyboard.

content.html: Lazyweb: I bought my wife an iPad Pro 10.5". She wants a case with full coverage, but she doesn't necessarily want a keyboard at all times. Any recommendations? I think a lightweight full-wrap case plus a small bluetooth keyboard.
